text:
Did you ever get an answer this? I’m stuck with the same thing.

We’re trying to send Affiliate links via automation emails but need the tracking function turned off, so when they copy the link it’s the actual link in the text.
Hey Jon. I think I passed. I see an idea in community to turn off click tracking per email basis.
Do your links need to clickable?
Or what if it was just the url as text

Wow, i feel dumb. Of COURSE they don’t have to clickable.

Thank you
Sometimes you just need help in thinking about it ina different way
I wish you could use Java. i was going to do a “copy to clipboard” button for them
That would be cool. Your email could say - click here to get your links and then have a page

Ya, I wish we could. The type of people we’re working with, we’ll be lucky if we can get them to look at the email, let alone click and go somewhere else.

The attention span of gnat.

Hey guys - maybe this is the spot to ask. I'm sending emails via HubSpot sequences. This doesn't exceed 500 contacts but my account gets blocked on Google workspace. These are existing platform users who have opted in to 121 and marketing communications.

Every email has an unsubscribe link and these are text emails with 1 link at most, usually no more than 120 words.

How (aside from paying for marketing contacts) can I avoid my Google workspace being constantly locked out from sending basic emails?
